As with the thread on the PC, lets share any deals for games that can be obtained for free.

The first game for the thread is SteamWorld Dig which is free on Origin. It is an excellent game with a sequel soon to be released. You'll need to create an Origin account, but that is free.

https://www.origin.com/usa/en-us/store/steamworld/steamworld-dig/standard-edition

This deal will only be available for a limited time and doesn't require you download the game, so i'd act sooner rather than later if this is something you're interested in playing.

Flimbo
Wednesday, September 6th, 2017, 11:44:42 PM

https://archive.org/details/msdosOregonTrailDeluxeThe_1992

Kapow! Free online Nostalgia. Not the Apple IIe version, but still good.

Edit: Also, not totally free, but the humble monthly bundle is absolutely worth mentioning. It's $12 per month and every month they give you steam keys for $150-200 worth of games. I'm 3 months in and haven't been disappointed yet.

https://www.humblebundle.com/monthly
